title: Living Together - Novel Updates
tags: C*nnilingus   Cohabitation   Cute Protagonist   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   F*llatio   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Lack of Common Sense   Marriage   Modern Day   Younger Love Interests
author: 东哥
description:
Before Jiang Wan moved into the house, the adjective she had heard the most about the man was ‘weird’.

She had thought nothing of it.

Until she saw him peeing in the bathroom by accident.

The man walked towards her with an expressionless face, furrowed brows, and a sexy bass voice.

“To avoid feeling awkward when we see each other in the future, now, you go pee.”

Jiang Wan: “…”>
